full_description:
HONOR AM61 Pro Choice Bluetooth Neckband

The HONOR AM61 Pro Choice Bluetooth Neckband is a wireless neckband earphone with noise cancellation and high-quality sound. It has a 13mm dynamic driver that generates rich and balanced music, as well as hybrid active noise cancellation technology that reduces background noise by up to 35dB. The Bluetooth 5.2 version of the neckband features the SBC codec for a reliable, low-latency wireless connection. A dual-mic system is also included, which improves speech quality and reduces background noise for clear calls. With a USB Type-C connector for quick and easy charging, the Honor AM61 Pro Choice Bluetooth Neckband offers a long-lasting battery that provides up to 22 hours of listening time on a single charge. HONOR AM61 Pro Choice Bluetooth Neckband has an IP54 classification, which means it can endure perspiration and spills. With the sleek and comfortable Honor AM61 Pro Choice Neckband, you can focus only on your calls and music.
